languages.text: "Хорошо. Я прикажу вывести блюстителей из этого отсека и выделить вам оружие. Посмотрим, как вы справитесь с самоуправлением и какие результаты это даст".
"Fine. I'll give the order for the enforcers to be withdrawn from this sector. And you will be given weapons. Let's see how you cope governing yourselves and what difference it makes."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо. Я прикажу вывести блюстителей из этого отсека и выделить вам оружие. Посмотрим, как вы справитесь с самоуправлением и какие результаты это даст".

traits.locale_text: "Fine. I'll give the order for the guards to be withdrawn from this sector. And you will be given weapons. Let's see how you cope governing yourselves and what difference it makes."
"Fine. I'll give the order for the guards to be withdrawn from this sector. And you will be given weapons. Let's see how you cope governing yourselves and what difference it makes."
"Fine. I'll give the order for the guards to be withdrawn from this sector. And you will be given weapons. Let's see how you cope governing yourselves and what difference it makes."
"Fine. I'll give the order for the enforcers to be withdrawn from this sector. And you will be given weapons. Let's see how you cope governing yourselves and what difference it makes."

languages.text: “很好，我会下令撤走这片区域的执法者，把武器发给你们。让我们看看吧，如果交给你们自由管理，情况会有哪些不同。”
languages.original_text: "Fine. I'll give the order for the enforcers to be withdrawn from this sector. And you will be given weapons. Let's see how you cope governing yourselves and what difference it makes."

traits.locale_text: “很好，我会下令撤走这片区域的镇压者，把武器发给你们。让我们看看吧，如果交给你们自由管理，情况会有哪些不同。”

languages.text: «De acuerdo. Ordenaré retirar a los guardias de este sector y les proporcionaré armas. Veamos cómo se autogobiernan y cuántas cosas cambian».
languages.original_text: "Fine. I'll give the order for the enforcers to be withdrawn from this sector. And you will be given weapons. Let's see how you cope governing yourselves and what difference it makes."

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo. Ordenaré retirar a los guardias de este sector y les proporcionaré armas. Veamos cómo se autogobiernan y cuántas cosas cambian».

languages.text: 「いいだろう。このセクターからエンフォーサーを撤退させる命令を下す。お前たちには武器を与える。お前たち自身がどう対処し、どのような違いが生まれるか見てみよう」
languages.original_text: "Fine. I'll give the order for the enforcers to be withdrawn from this sector. And you will be given weapons. Let's see how you cope governing yourselves and what difference it makes."

traits.locale_text: 「いいだろう。このセクターからエンフォーサーを撤退させる命令を下す。お前たちには武器を与える。お前たち自身がどう対処し、どのような違いが生まれるか見てみよう」

languages.text: "Schön. Ich gebe den Befehl, dass die Enforcers aus diesem Sektor abgezogen werden. Und Ihr erhaltet Waffen. Wir werden sehen, wie Ihr mit der Selbstverwaltung zurechtkommt und welchen Unterschied sie macht."
languages.original_text: "Fine. I'll give the order for the enforcers to be withdrawn from this sector. And you will be given weapons. Let's see how you cope governing yourselves and what difference it makes."

traits.locale_text: "Schön. Ich gebe den Befehl, dass die Enforcers aus diesem Sektor abgezogen werden. Und Ihr erhaltet Waffen. Wir werden sehen, wie Ihr mit der Selbstverwaltung zurechtkommt und welchen Unterschied sie macht."

languages.text: « Entendu. Je vais ordonner aux prévôts de quitter le secteur, et nous allons vous fournir des armes. Nous verrons bien si vous êtes capables de vous gérer seuls et si cela change la donne. »
languages.original_text: "Fine. I'll give the order for the enforcers to be withdrawn from this sector. And you will be given weapons. Let's see how you cope governing yourselves and what difference it makes."

traits.locale_text: « Entendu. Je vais ordonner aux prévôts de quitter le secteur, et nous allons vous fournir des armes. Nous verrons bien si vous êtes capables de vous gérer seuls et si cela change la donne. »

languages.text: "Pekâlâ. İnfazcıların bu sektörden çekilmesi için gerekli emri vereceğim. Silahlarınız da yakında teslim edilecek. Kendinizi yöneterek nasıl bir fark yaratacaksınız, göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Fine. I'll give the order for the enforcers to be withdrawn from this sector. And you will be given weapons. Let's see how you cope governing yourselves and what difference it makes."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ. İnfazcıların bu sektörden çekilmesi için gerekli emri vereceğim. Silahlarınız da yakında teslim edilecek. Kendinizi yöneterek nasıl bir fark yaratacaksınız, göreceğiz."
